description: Enable AI assistants to seamlessly interact with your Metabase analytics platform. Access dashboards, cards, databases, and execute queries directly through conversational AI. Manage and manipulate your analytics data with comprehensive tools and secure authentication methods.

metabaseUrl.description: URL of the Metabase instance (e.g. https://your-metabase-instance.com)

metabaseApiKey.description: API Key for authenticating with Metabase (alternative to email/password)

metabasePassword.description: Password for authenticating with Metabase (required if not using API key)

metabaseUserEmail.description: Email address for authenticating with Metabase (required if not using API key)

capabilities.name: execute_card
capabilities.description: Execute a Metabase question/card and get results

capabilities.name: get_dashboard_cards
capabilities.description: Get all cards in a dashboard

capabilities.name: execute_query
capabilities.description: Execute a SQL query against a Metabase database

capabilities.name: create_card
capabilities.description: Create a new question/card in Metabase

capabilities.name: update_card_visualization
capabilities.description: Update visualization settings for a card

capabilities.name: add_card_to_dashboard
capabilities.description: Add a card to a dashboard

capabilities.name: create_dashboard
capabilities.description: Create a new dashboard in Metabase

capabilities.name: create_collection
capabilities.description: Create a new collection in Metabase

capabilities.name: list_tables
capabilities.description: List all tables in a database

capabilities.name: get_table_fields
capabilities.description: Get all fields/columns in a table
